member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency
member.summary: The class is a base class that is used to derive the node classes in SQL Server Management Objects (SMO) scripting classes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency.#ctor(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified dependency.
member.param: A object value that specifies the dependency.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency.Copy
member.summary: Returns a copy of the referenced object.
member.returns: A object that is a copy of the referenced object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency.Links
member.summary: Gets the dependency list.
member.returns: A object value that specifies the dependency list.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency.Urn
member.summary: Gets or sets the URN value that uniquely identifies a Microsoft SQL Server scriptable object that is represented by a node in a object or a object.
member.returns: A object value that specifies the SQL Server scriptable object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DependencyChainCollection
member.summary: The class represents a collection of objects used in dependency discovery operations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DependencyChainCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DependencyChainCollection.#ctor(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DependencyChainCollection)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on an existing dependency chain collection.
member.param: A object that specifies the dependency chain collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DependencyChainCollection.Add(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency)
member.summary: Adds a object to the collection.
member.returns: A object that specifies the collection after the object has been added.
member.param: A object that is to be added to the object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DependencyChainCollection.Contains(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified object exists in the referenced collection.
member.returns: A Boolean value that specifies whether the object exists in the referenced collection.If True, the object exists in the referenced collection.If False, the object does not exist in the referenced collection.
member.param: A object of which the existence in the referenced collection is to be determined.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DependencyChainCollection.CopyTo(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional array beginning at the index value specified.
member.param: An array of objects
An value that specifies the index value from where to start the copy.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DependencyChainCollection.IndexOf(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency)
member.summary: Returns the index position of the specified object within the referenced collection.
member.returns: An int32 value that specifies the index position of the object in the referenced collection.
member.param: A object for which the index position is to be returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DependencyChainCollection.Insert(System.Int32,Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency)
member.summary: Inserts a object in the referenced collection at the specified index position.
member.param: A object that is to be inserted into the referenced collection.
An value that specifies the index position at which to insert the object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DependencyChainCollection.Remove(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Dependency)
member.summary: Removes a object from the referenced collection.
member.param: A object that is to be removed from the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DependencyChainCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a object in the collection by index number.
member.returns: A object value that represents the dependency chain.
member.param: An value that specifies the position of the object in the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectProperty.Expensive
member.summary: Gets or sets a property value that specifies whether the object property is expensive in terms of time taken to load and initialize.
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the property is expensive in terms of time to load. If True, the property is expensive.If False (default), the property is not expensive.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectProperty.ExtendedType
member.summary: Gets or sets a property value that specifies whether the property is an extended property or not.
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the property is an extended property. If True, the property is an extended property.If False (default), the property is an ordinary property.

member.returns: A value that specifies the name of the property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectProperty.ReadOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets the property value that specifies whether the property is read-only or read/write.
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the property can be modified and retrieved or retrieved only. If True, the property can be retrieved only.If False (default), the property can be modified and retrieved.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of property.
member.returns: A value that specifies the type of property.

member.summary: Gets the fixed properties of the Xpath expression block.
member.returns: An object value that specifies the fixed properties.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.XPathExpressionBlock.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the Xpath expression block.
member.returns: A value that specifies the name of the Xpath expression block.
